State visit. Met with Governor-GeneralRichard Caseyand Prime MinisterHarold Holt. Intended as a "thank-you" visit for the Australian government's solid support for the Vietnam War effort, the president andfirst ladywere greeted by demonstrations from anti-war protesters.[288]
